definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: knowledge, opinion (late)—only sf. [[דֵּעִי]] Job 32:6 + 3 t., and pl. [[דֵּעִים]] Job 37:6; all in speech of Elihu.
knowledge, ´[[תְּמִים ד]] Job 37:16 one perfect in knowledge (of God).
judgement, opinion Job 36:3; [[חַוּׁת דֵּעִי]] Job 32:6 to declare my opinion, so v:Job 32:10, v:Job 32:17.
